fullText: The revival of August Wilson's 'Joe Turner's Come and Gone' is a powerful reminder of why Wilson is considered one of America's greatest playwrights. LaTanya Richardson Jackson's direction brings fresh insight to this haunting tale of displacement and spiritual searching.
